channel.title: Crash at Gordon's locker and then game won't start back up
channel.description: I was playing through, and wow it looked fabulous. While playing I got to the locker room and opened Gordon's locker and the game crashed when I walked inside of it. I thought it was just a random crash, so I tried restarting the game, and now it crashes before the main menu can load. Attached are the original crash, and 2 start-up crashes. Best of luck, and I look forward to a response! hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T22_37_7C0.mdmp (90.9 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T22_44_50C0.mdmp (94.4 KB) hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_14T22_46_40C0.mdmp (94.4 KB)
